title: Screen size extend fix rework
body: Reverts the language changes introduced in !20

title: Bugfix: fixing screen rendering on some edge case + minor code refactoring + clarified --help
Screen size extend fix
body:
Examples that reproduce the initial bug:
```
$ echo -e '1
2
3
2' | diagram -H
$ echo -e '1
2
3
2' | diagram -V
```

title: Adding --sort-by-column
body:
Example of output on an unordered input with `-kH --sort-by-column=1`:

![sorted-diagram](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/925560/49584574-12a65c00-f95c-11e8-8779-cd1fdc4afce1.png)

title: Update diagram.py
body:
Hey man, you write some bad-ass software!

Encoding defaulted to NONE on my machine for some reason, so I got run-time errors.
Had  to add this to get it to work - and THEN I fell in love :D

This stuff is _awesome_ !

title: Library example to address issue #10
body: Provide a simple wrapper showing how to use diagram as a library.

title: Fix: write to file should handle bytes
body: The previous code uses 'r' which I believe is a typo

title: Add support for >=python-3.3
body:
Tested using `./bin/random 100 | python2.7 diagram.py` and `./bin/random
100 | python3.3 diagram.py`
